description: JSON Schema for deck layout description

_88deckPosition.description: a position on the liquidhandling deck

___^[0-9]+$.description: the contents of the well at the given position in the column

___residual_volume.description: volume which cannot be removed from the wells of a plate

$eref.description: Represent a plate on the deck

___missing_tips.description: Lists the positions at which tips are not present

items.description: Well coordinates of the missing tip

$eref.description: Represent a tipbox on the deck

___discarded_tips.description: The number of discarded tips in the waste

$eref.description: Represent a tipwaste on the deck

_88liquid.description: Describe a liquid in a plate well

___name.description: The display name of the liquid

$eref.description: A measurement, typically of a Volume

___unit.description: The units in which the measurement is expressed

___total_volume.description: The total volume present of the liquid

___components.description: The sub-components which make up this liquid

___name.description: the display name of the sub-component

___unit.description: the units in which the concentration is expressed

___name.description: The name of this particular object

___description.description: A handy description of this object

___well_type.description: The type, or rather the shape, of the wells in this plate

___rows.description: The number of rows of wells or tips in this object

___well_start.description: The position of the center of the upper left-most well or tip in this object

___type.description: The type name of this object, e.g. 'pcrplate'

___manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of this object

___well_dimensions.description: The size of the wells or tips in this object

___id.description: The unique ID of the object

___columns.description: The number of columns of wells or tips in this object

_88deckSummary.description: Describes the layout of a liquidhandling deck at a given point in time

___positions.description: Keys are the names of positions on the deck of the liquidhandling deck

$eref.description: a position on the liquidhandling deck

___name.description: The name of this particular object

___description.description: A handy description of this object

___well_type.description: The type, or rather the shape, of the wells in this plate

___rows.description: The number of rows of wells or tips in this object

___well_start.description: The position of the center of the upper left-most well or tip in this object

___type.description: The type name of this object, e.g. 'pcrplate'

___manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of this object

___well_dimensions.description: The size of the wells or tips in this object

___id.description: The unique ID of the object

___columns.description: The number of columns of wells or tips in this object

___discarded_tips.description: The number of discarded tips in the waste

_88tipwaste.description: Represent a tipwaste on the deck

_88measurement.description: A measurement, typically of a Volume

___unit.description: The units in which the measurement is expressed

___name.description: The name of this particular object

___description.description: A handy description of this object

___well_type.description: The type, or rather the shape, of the wells in this plate

___rows.description: The number of rows of wells or tips in this object

___well_start.description: The position of the center of the upper left-most well or tip in this object

___type.description: The type name of this object, e.g. 'pcrplate'

___manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of this object

___well_dimensions.description: The size of the wells or tips in this object

___id.description: The unique ID of the object

___columns.description: The number of columns of wells or tips in this object

___missing_tips.description: Lists the positions at which tips are not present

items.description: Well coordinates of the missing tip

_88tipbox.description: Represent a tipbox on the deck

___name.description: The name of this particular object

___description.description: A handy description of this object

___well_type.description: The type, or rather the shape, of the wells in this plate

___rows.description: The number of rows of wells or tips in this object

___well_dimensions.description: The size of the wells or tips in this object

$eref.description: Describe a liquid in a plate well

___name.description: The display name of the liquid

___total_volume.description: The total volume present of the liquid

___components.description: The sub-components which make up this liquid

___name.description: the display name of the sub-component

___unit.description: the units in which the concentration is expressed

___^[0-9]+$.description: the contents of the well at the given position in the column

___unit.description: The units in which the measurement is expressed

___residual_volume.description: volume which cannot be removed from the wells of a plate

_88plate.description: Represent a plate on the deck

$eref.description: Describes the layout of a liquidhandling deck at a given point in time

___positions.description: Keys are the names of positions on the deck of the liquidhandling deck

___version.description: the version of this schema for validation

___new_ids.description: maps from the object IDs in 'before' to 'after'
